q_en: What products are included in James's order?

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, p.attributes FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id JOIN order_product op ON p.id = op.product_id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'James';
steps.description: To find out what products are included in James's order, we need to retrieve the product names from the products table that are part of the order placed by James. We will join the necessary tables to get this information.

response:
Sure! Here is the answer to your question:

| Product ID | Attributes    |
|------------|---------------|
| 22         | Brown, S size |
| 26         | Red, M size   |
| 14         | Yellow, L size|
| 6          | Brown, L size |
| 7          | Purple, M size|

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. üòÑ
